snippet: An analysis of eight people who went into cardiac arrest after receiving shocks from the devices highlights the risks they carry and the importance of using them properly.
abstract: Study published online in the journal Circulation finds that the electrical shock delivered to the chest by the stun gun weapon manufactured by Taser International can lead to cardiac arrest and sudden death.
lead_paragraph: An analysis of eight people who went into cardiac arrest after receiving shocks from the devices highlights the risks they carry and the importance of using them properly.

headline.seo: Taser Shot to the Chest Can Kill, a Study Warns
headline.main: Tasers Pose Risks to Heart, a Study Warns
headline.print_headline: Tasers Pose Risks to Heart, a Study Warns
